alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 1:22AM CDT until May 09 at 5:57AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Spring River near Quapaw affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River near Quapaw. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, recreational areas near the gage site are inundated to a depth of several feet. The gage site may be cut off from easy access. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 28.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
